  physical_appearance: The image shows a colour photograph. It features six people. Three of them are sitting down while the other three are standing behind. They are facing the direction in which the photograph was captured. The elderly lady in the centre of the photograph is wearing her ethnic costume
 while the two men on either side of her are wearing shirts and pants. The three ladies standing behind are all bespectacled. The background of the photograph suggests that it was taken in the interior of a building
 with the door and windows being visible.

metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a colour photograph. It features six people. Three of them are sitting down while the other three are standing behind. They are facing the direction in which the photograph was captured. The elderly lady in the centre of the photograph is wearing her ethnic costume, while the two men on either side of her are wearing shirts and pants. The three ladies standing behind are all bespectacled. The background of the photograph suggests that it was taken in the interior of a building, with the door and windows being visible.
